lrc.lyric:
[00:18.720]Twenty-five years and my life is still
[00:21.810]Trying to get up that great big hill of hope
[00:27.840]For a destination
[00:32.350]I realized quickly when I knew I should
[00:35.690]That the world was made up of this brotherhood of man
[00:42.090]For whatever that means
[00:46.440]And so I cry sometimes
[00:48.300]When I'm lying in bed
[00:49.990]Just to get it all out
[00:51.700]What's in my head
[00:53.670]And I am,I am feeling a little peculiar
[01:00.510]And so I wake in the morning
[01:02.790]And I step outside
[01:04.370]And I take a deep breath and I get real high
[01:07.890]And I scream at the top of my lungs
[01:10.760]What's going on?
[01:14.530]And I say, hey hey hey hey
[01:22.010]I said hey, what's going on?
[01:28.720]And I say, hey hey hey hey
[01:36.250]I said hey, what's going on?
[01:44.330]ooh, ooh ooh
[01:57.620]and I try, oh my god do I try
[02:03.380]I try all the time, in this institution
[02:12.220]And I pray, oh my god do I pray
[02:17.720]I pray every single day
[02:22.440]For a revolution
[02:27.210]And so I cry sometimes
[02:29.100]When I'm lying in bed
[02:31.080]Just to get it all out
[02:33.270]What's in my head
[02:34.850]And I am,I am feeling a little peculiar
[02:41.830]And so I wake in the morning
[02:43.760]And I step outside
[02:45.350]And I take a deep breath and I get real high
[02:48.870]And I scream at the top of my lungs
[02:51.860]What's going on?
[02:55.150]And I say, hey hey hey hey
[03:02.950]I said hey, what's going on?
[03:09.420]And I say, hey hey hey hey
[03:17.430]I said hey, what's going on?
[03:23.800]And I say, hey hey hey hey
[03:31.400]I said hey, what's going on?
[03:39.600]ooh, ooh ooh
[03:54.470]Twenty-five years and my life is still
[03:58.420]Trying to get up that great big hill of hope
[04:05.450]For a destination

tlyric.lyric:
[by:已逝的过往]
[00:18.720]廿五年去 我一生波澜依旧
[00:21.810]竭力挣扎 想探到天空星光时候
[00:27.840]为自己一生留念
[00:32.350]我这才发现自己后知后觉
[00:35.690]这是个人与人情感穿起的世界
[00:42.090]可我仍孤身一人
[00:46.440]所以有时我会蜷缩在床
[00:48.300]任泪水流下
[00:49.990]渴望泪水洗走
[00:51.700]心中多少苦悲
[00:53.670]这以后 空洞的胸口 却有着莫名悸动
[01:00.510]在黎明中醒来
[01:02.790]我迈出屋外
[01:04.370]我深吸口气 大口呼出愉快
[01:07.890]我灵魂共鸣着肺腑大声呐喊
[01:10.760]这世界怎么了？！
[01:14.530]我大喊 嘿
[01:22.010]想知道 未来去向何方
[01:28.720]我唱着 嘿
[01:36.250]方才发觉 这就是人生吗？
[01:44.330]
[01:57.620]我努力着 天啊 我竭力挣扎
[02:03.380]甚至改变去自己 想挣脱命运的桎梏
[02:12.220]我祈祷 威严的神啊 我匍匐在地
[02:17.720]日日夜夜的乞求
[02:22.440]祷告人生的变革
[02:27.210]所以有时我会蜷缩在床
[02:29.100]任泪水流下
[02:31.080]渴望泪水洗走
[02:33.270]脑海里太多烦恼
[02:34.850]这以后 空白的意识 却听到惊异的共鸣
[02:41.830]在黎明中醒来
[02:43.760]我迈出屋外
[02:45.350]我深吸口气 我深吸口气
[02:48.870]我灵魂共鸣着肺腑大声呐喊
[02:51.860]这世界怎么了？！
[02:55.150]我大喊 嘿
[03:02.950]想知道 未来去向何方
[03:09.420]我大喊 嘿
[03:17.430]想知道 未来去向何方
[03:23.800]我唱着 嘿
[03:31.400]方才发觉 这就是人生吗？
[03:39.600]
[03:54.470]廿五年去 我一生波澜依旧
[03:58.420]竭力挣扎 想探到山顶希望的光芒
[04:05.450]只为我这一生
